caption.p: Effects of time-of-addition of RS on IFV replication. RS at a concentration of 50 µg/mL (closed bar) or 500 µg/mL (open bar) was added to the culture medium 3 h prior to virus infection ( a), during infection for 1 h ( b), during infection for 1 h, and throughout the subsequent incubation ( c), immediately after infection ( d), at 1 h post-infection (p.i.) ( e), at 3 h p.i. ( f), or at 6 h p.i. ( g). Each value is expressed as the mean ± SD from independent duplicate assays.
